pr_title: Use Codestarts as default project generation tool

timeline.message:
Codestarts as default codegen

- Codestarts which only works alone are called "Singleton"
- Added checks to avoid conflict between Singelton codestarts
- Make codestart the default codegen and add a `legacyCodegen` flag
- Update the guides for compat by adding `resteasy` when relevent

Fixes ##12113

Codestarts as default codegen

Add deps version handling and fix bugs in Codestarts

Add deps version handling and fix bugs in Codestarts

timeline.bodyText: Why not use AppArtifactKey or AppArtifactCoords?
timeline.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: Because this field can accept both (ga or gav), AppArtifactCoords doesn't extend AppArtifactKey and AppArtifactCoords is not meant to be used without version.
replies.author: ia3andy

timeline.message:
Codestarts as default codegen

- Codestarts which only works alone are called "Singleton"
- Added checks to avoid conflict between Singelton codestarts
- Make codestart the default codegen and add a legacyCodegen flag
- Use RESTEasy example as default (commandmode example is not selectable for now.. until a picocli example?)
- Update the guides with `-DnoExamples` when when relevent
- Update the tests
